## IPackageJsonExports."node-addons" property

This export is like [IPackageJsonExports.node](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonexports.node.md) in that it matches for any NodeJS environment. This export is specifically for native C++ addons.

**Signature:**

```typescript
'node-addons'?: string | IPackageJsonExports;
```
